🏛 Donald Trump Flushes Away America’s Reputation - NYT

Where to begin? How about with a simple observation: The president of the United States is a racist. And another: The United States has a long and ugly history of excluding immigrants based on race or national origin

I experienced anew kind of precipitation this morning on our way to school, it was what I’m calling “freezing slush”. Hope everyone is staying safe today/tonight. 🌨🌬❄️

items.title: Search Collections with Emoji
items.content_html:
Love this new idea from @manton for the Micro.blog service. Been playing with this idea on my own micro blog for a while now. I have the following already sketches out:

✈️ Aviation 🚀 Aerospace/Rockets 🚗 Automotive 🏛 Politics 📱 Phones / Mobile technology 💻 Computers 🔬 Science ⚽️🏀🏈⚾️ Respective sports

📚 A Raging Spirit

A revealing new portrait of Robert F. Kennedy that gets closer to the man than any book before, by bestselling author Chris Matthews, an esteemed Kennedy expert and anchor of MSNBC’s Hardball.

🏛 100 days

One hundred days ago, Congress let the funding for the Children’s Health Insurance Program expire. For one hundred days, a program that covers 9 million American children has been left in this strange limbo, with the worst consequences being averted but nonetheless creeping
Home today with a sick toddler! Keeping him warm and cozy on the couch and hoping he feels better soon!
